author: DAVID CRARY
title: Rejection or welcome: Transgender Catholics encounter both
description: For transgender Catholics across the United States, retaining their faith can entail complex calculations. They face rebukes from some fellow Catholics, including many bishops, yet find full acceptance in some premises of the church.
